snippet: The price of oil climbed close to $100 a barrel after concern that the crisis in the largest Arab nation could disrupt the distribution of crude oil from the region.
abstract: Stock market ends slightly lower after reports of intensifying political turmoil in Egypt offset good news about American economy.
lead_paragraph: The price of oil climbed close to $100 a barrel after concern that the crisis in the largest Arab nation could disrupt the distribution of crude oil from the region.
